Articles.Content:
This is my F-18 "Hornet" replica built for stock KSP Enjoy!

Download

 

 

 

Edited May 5, 2016 by Yaeah
I like it a lot. I was waiting for the new 1.1 engines to build one of these. IRL the two on the f-18 look tiny, but you did a good job with the turbojets.

I like it a lot. I was waiting for the new 1.1 engines to build one of these. IRL the two on the f-18 look tiny, but you did a good job with the turbojets.

Yeah, the turbos look way too large for this, which is why I'm polling for the BDDynamic's engines

Have you seen these from the 1.1 concept art. A midpoint between the basic and turbofan, specifically for jets.

I've already shrunk a raptor down in preparation. As soon as it drops I just gotta stick them on there. All jet designs are about to get a lot better. That turbofan made every jet builder's life hard.

Have you seen these from the 1.1 concept art. A midpoint between the basic and turbofan, specifically for jets.

http://i.imgur.com/PTBDjCK.jpg

I've already shrunk a raptor down in preparation. As soon as it drops I just gotta stick them on there. All jet designs are about to get a lot better. That turbofan made every jet builder's life hard.

M... More... More jet engines...

More...

Jet engines...

WHOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!! HELL YEAH! MOAR BOOSTERS!!!!

It's about time they added more jet engines.

Oh yeah, nice plane too, F-18s are cool, as are all carrier based fighters.

I have a number of craft that immediately come to mind as well
This is a great F/A-18 replica man! How's it handle?

This is a great F/A-18 replica man! How's it handle?

great, but it's a tad unstable, so be careful with tight turns.
